item.title: GRASS GIS brand
item.description: Official logo This is the official GRASS GIS logo. Please use it to refer to the GRASS GIS project, software or community, and do not alter its shape or color. Vector SVG   EPS   OpenOffice   Sketch   Raster PNG   JPG   TIF   Colors palette GRASS green HEX   #088B36 RGB   8,139,54 HSL   120,100%,28% Soft green HEX   #9ED29C RGB   158,210,156 HSL   188,38%,72% Light green HEX   #EFF4E8 RGB   239,244,232 HSL   85,35%,93% Dark green HEX   #B8C6A5 RGB   184,198,165 HSL   85,22%,71% White HEX   #FFFFFF RGB   255,255,255 HSL   85,22%,71% Light grey HEX   #FFFFFF RGB   255,255,255 HSL   85,22%,71% Dark grey HEX   #B8C6A5 RGB   184,198,165 HSL   85,22%,71% Black HEX   #FFFFFF RGB   255,255,255 HSL   85,22%,71%

item.title: GRASS theme elements
item.description: GRASS theme elements The following Markdown and HTML markup elements should be used to extend the website consistently. Headlines Section title # Section title Page title ## Page title Section subtitle ### Section subtitle Text Default Default Italic *Italic* Bold **Bold**       Blockquote
